definition: to bid competitively/to compete to buy (at auction)

sentences.english: Who Will Bid Next For Cadbury?
sentences.chinese: 誰會成爲吉百利的下一個競購者？

sentences.english: She said they had been "more than surprised" by the global interest.
sentences.chinese: 她說，故居引發全球競購令他們“喜出望外”。

sentences.english: Because the Nortel loss was just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲谷歌在北電專利競購上的失利僅僅是個開始。
